name: Tap Transcend
description:
Feel the current of the universe, transcending space and time by tapping your way through epochs of existence.
Evolve from simple matter and energy into an interplanetary civilization.
Discover that you are not alone...
Defend your civilization and universe from the ruthless logic of an ancient race.

How?
Tap!


*Warning: This app has been optimized for the iPhone 6. Performance is not guaranteed on the iPhone 4S or older generations.*
